metadata.name: Balance Ace Cap Tablet film coated

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for use as a nutritional supplement

contraindications.disease: Injectable selenium is more acutely toxic than oral administration with an intramuscular LD50 of 0 5 mg kg BW in lambs A33009
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: DB11135 is an essential trace mineral that plays a critical role in antioxidant actions anti inflammatory effects immune function and the production of active thyroid hormone A33007

incompatibilities.description: The bioavailability of Selenic acid can be decreased when combined with Eltrombopag
